name: Iteration Operation by RealiableCh
description:
A spaceship with 100 of robots in it is sent to Black Hole to gather some useful Intel to save the Earth from collapse.

Robot will active only 1 at a time. In case of a Robot is destroy, it will upload its memory back to the spaceship and this memory will be given to Robot which will operate next.
That why this operation is call "Iteration". So let's hope that one of them will comeback alive with the useful intel. For the humankinds.
